15 void thinZhangSuenIteration(cv::Mat& imageUnderProcessing, int iteration)
16 {
17  cv::Mat marker = cv::Mat::zeros(imageUnderProcessing.size(), CV_8UC1);
18 
19  uchar* inputData = imageUnderProcessing.data;
20  uchar* markerData = marker.data;
21 
22  for (int i = 1; i < imageUnderProcessing.rows - 1; ++i)
23  {
24  for (int j = 1; j < imageUnderProcessing.cols - 1; ++j)
25  {
26  uchar& marker_p1 = markerData[i * imageUnderProcessing.cols + j];
27 
28  uchar p2 = inputData[(i - 1) * imageUnderProcessing.cols + (j - 0)];
29  uchar p3 = inputData[(i - 1) * imageUnderProcessing.cols + (j + 1)];
30  uchar p4 = inputData[(i - 0) * imageUnderProcessing.cols + (j + 1)];
31  uchar p5 = inputData[(i + 1) * imageUnderProcessing.cols + (j + 1)];
32  uchar p6 = inputData[(i + 1) * imageUnderProcessing.cols + (j - 0)];
33  uchar p7 = inputData[(i + 1) * imageUnderProcessing.cols + (j - 1)];
34  uchar p8 = inputData[(i - 0) * imageUnderProcessing.cols + (j - 1)];
35  uchar p9 = inputData[(i - 1) * imageUnderProcessing.cols + (j - 1)];
36 
37  int A = (p2 == 0 && p3 == 1) + (p3 == 0 && p4 == 1) +
38  (p4 == 0 && p5 == 1) + (p5 == 0 && p6 == 1) +
39  (p6 == 0 && p7 == 1) + (p7 == 0 && p8 == 1) +
40  (p8 == 0 && p9 == 1) + (p9 == 0 && p2 == 1);
41 
42  int B = p2 + p3 + p4 + p5 + p6 + p7 + p8 + p9;
43 
44  int m1 = iteration == 0 ? (p2 * p4 * p6) : (p2 * p4 * p8);
45  int m2 = iteration == 0 ? (p4 * p6 * p8) : (p2 * p6 * p8);
46 
47  if (A == 1 && (B >= 2 && B <= 6) && m1 == 0 && m2 == 0)
48  {
49  marker_p1 = 1;
50  }
51  }
52  }
53 
54  imageUnderProcessing &= ~marker;
55 }
56 
57 void prl::thinZhangSuen(cv::Mat& inputImage, cv::Mat& outputImage)
58 {
59  if (inputImage.empty())
60  {
61  throw std::invalid_argument("Input image for thinning is empty");
62  }
63  // we work with color images
64  if (inputImage.type() != CV_8UC3 && inputImage.type() != CV_8UC1)
65  {
66  throw std::invalid_argument("Invalid type of image for thinning (required 8 or 24 bits per pixel)");
67  }
68 
69  cv::Mat imageUnderProcess;
70 
71  if (inputImage.data == outputImage.data)
72  {
73  imageUnderProcess = inputImage;
74  }
75  else
76  {
77  imageUnderProcess = inputImage.clone();
78  }
79 
80  if (imageUnderProcess.channels() == 3)
81  {
82  cv::cvtColor(imageUnderProcess, imageUnderProcess, CV_BGR2GRAY);
83  }
84 
85  imageUnderProcess &= 1;
86 
87  cv::Mat prev = cv::Mat::zeros(imageUnderProcess.size(), CV_8UC1);
88  cv::Mat diff;
89 
90  do
91  {
92  thinZhangSuenIteration(imageUnderProcess, 0);
93  thinZhangSuenIteration(imageUnderProcess, 1);
94 
95  cv::absdiff(imageUnderProcess, prev, diff);
96  imageUnderProcess.copyTo(prev);
97  }
98  while (cv::countNonZero(diff) > 0);
99 
100  if (inputImage.data == outputImage.data)
101  {
102  imageUnderProcess *= 255;
103  }
104  else
105  {
106  outputImage = imageUnderProcess * 255;
107  }
108 }

void thinZhangSuenIteration(cv::Mat &imageUnderProcessing, int iteration)
Perform one thinning iteration.
